About Us

Empowering Tarlaqueños Through Quality Technical Education

The Tarlac Center for Learning and Skills Success (TCLASS) is a premier technical vocational training center under the Provincial Government of Tarlac. We are committed to providing accessible, quality education that prepares our students for local and global employment.

TESDA Accredited

National Certificate programs

Scholarship Programs

TCLASS & maYAP scholarships

Industry Partners

Employment assistance

Hands-on Training

Practical skills development

Building Futures Since 2007

17+

Years of Excellence

Our Programs

Training Programs & Scholarships

We offer various TESDA-accredited programs under TCLASS and maYAP scholarships with minimal fees or fully funded opportunities.
